meanings.definition: Grind (something) again to make it finer or smoother.
meanings.sent1: She carefully regrinds the coffee beans to enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent2: He always regrinds his axe before chopping wood.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally regrinds the salt twice, making the soup too salty.
meanings.sent4: The artist regrinds the pencil to create a finer point for detailed sketches.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler regrinds the gemstone to bring out its natural brilliance.

meanings.definition: The act of grinding something again to make it finer or smoother.
meanings.sent1: The regrinds of the metal parts improved their quality.
meanings.sent2: The workshop produces regrinds of plastic for recycling purposes.
meanings.sent3: The student's constant regrinds of the pencil annoyed the teacher.
meanings.sent4: The regrinds of the spices added depth to the dish's flavor.
meanings.sent5: The regrinds of the sandpaper made the surface incredibly smooth.
